item.title: VMC
item.description: Development version (the whole repository): git clone http://github.com/vmc-project/vmc.git The ‘pro’ version is under construction.

item.title: Geant3
item.description: Development version (the whole repository): git clone http://github.com/vmc-project/geant3.git To switch to the ‘pro’ tagged version 2.7: cd geant3 git checkout v2-7 To switch to the ‘old’ tagged version 2.6:cd geant3 git checkout v2-6 For older versions see the correspondent tag and the required version of ROOT in the table.

item.title: Geant4 VMC
item.description: Development version (the whole repository): git clone http://github.com/vmc-project/geant4_vmc.git To switch to the ‘pro’ tagged version 4.0.p3 (compatible with Geant4 10.5.x): git checkout v4-0-p3 To switch to the ‘old’ tagged version 3.6.p6 X(compatible with Geant4 10.4.x): cd geant4_vmc git checkout v3-6-p6 The list of new developments, bug fixes and the required versions of ROOT and Geant4 for each version can be found in the history file. Download Geant4 - from the Geant4 Web site

item.title: Tar Files
item.description: Pro versions Package Version Tar file Tested with vmc 0.1 (*) v0-1.tar.gz ROOT v6.18.00 geant3 2.7 v2-7.tar.gz ROOT 6.14.06 geant4_vmc 4.0.p3 v4-0-p3.tar.gz ROOT 6.18.04,Geant4 10.5.p01 (with embedded CLHEP 2.4.1.0), VGM 4.4 and 4.6, Garfield master at c5efc3e352101b59e (*) this is development version, the pro version is under construction In general, the VMC packages can be built with the Root versions which they were tested with and higher, and Geant4 VMC with the Geant4 version which it was tested with including the patches.
